Het wachtwoord van Enpass is het enige wat je hoeft te onthouden.\r\n\r\nENPASS IS ONVERSLAANBAAR\r\nGeen van je gegevens worden op bedrijfsservers opgeslagen.\r\n• Geen aanmelding of abonnement vereist.\r\n• Synchroniseert gegevens op alle mobiele en desktop-apparaten via iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive en WebDAV.\r\n• 80+ voorgedefinieerde sjablonen om alle soorten informatie op te slaan.\r\n• Makkelijk te gebruiken met overal eenvoudig en consistent design.\r\n\r\nVOOR EEN ZORGELOOS LEVEN\r\n• Aanmelden op nieuwe websites met sterke wachtwoorden is geen probleem meer omdat je met de ingebouwde wachtwoordmanager je unieke en sterke wachtwoorden in de gewenste stijl kunt maken.\r\n• Gemakkelijk en veilig online winkelen. Vult je inloggegevens, creditcards en adressen in met behulp van de Enpass-extensie.\r\n• Ondersteunt het gebruik van Windows Hello gegevens voor snelle ontgrendeling van gegevens.\r\n• Het gaat niet alleen om wachtwoorden. Je kunt zelfs bijlagen, bankrekeningen, adressen voor auto-aanvullen, BSN-nummers, reisdocumenten en allerlei andere gegevens opslaan.\r\n\r\nVOOR ENPASS IS VEILIGHEID ESSENTIEEL\r\n• Onze filosofie is jouw veiligheid! Wij gebruiken SQLCIPHER, een transparante, geaccepteerde en open-source SQLite-extensie voor het veilig bewaren van je gegevens met sleutel-afgeleide AES-256 van 100.000 iteraties van PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256.\r\n• Je gegevens blijven altijd met jouw hoofdwachtwoord gecodeerd en blijven veilig, zelfs als je je apparaat kwijt bent.\r\n• Enpass vergrendelt automatisch wanneer niet in gebruik.\r\n\r\nENPASS IS VOOR IEDEREEN\r\n• Welk platform je ook het liefst gebruikt, overal vind je Enpass.\r\n• Werk samen met familie en collega's met behulp van meerdere gesynchroniseerde kluizen via gedeelde cloud-accounts.\r\n• Eenvoudig design dat bij iedereen past.\r\n• Als je je wachtwoorden met andere software gebruikt, kun je deze vrij importeren naar Enpass met behulp van onze gratis Desktop-versie. Meer informatie op https://www.enpass.io/docs/desktop/import_export.html\r\n\r\nHAAL HET BESTE UIT ENPASS\r\n• De gratis versie van Enpass voor dit platform beperkt niet je volledige toegang tot jouw gegevens. Wel kun je een eenmalige in-app aankoop doen voor de volgende premiumfuncties:\r\n- Windows Hello\r\n- Donker thema\r\n- Aangepaste categorieën en sjablonen\r\n• Meer informatie op https://www.enpass.io/pricing/\r\n\r\nWIJ STAAN VOOR JE KLAAR\r\nWij zijn bij Enpass voortdurend op zoek om je de beste ervaring met wachtwoordbeheer te bieden. Voel je vrij om voor vragen contact met ons op te nemen via onze @EnpassApp op Twitter en facebook.com/EnpassApp.\r\nWe hebben ook een community van Enpass-fans die je op https://discussion.enpass.io MUSIC, NATURALLY.\r\nStaffPad is a groundbreaking music notation application, featuring advanced handwriting recognition. Write music, using your digital pen*, and StaffPad will transform your handwritten notation into a beautifully typeset score which you can then edit, play back, print and share. For composers and musicians, StaffPad revolutionises the art of writing music.\r\n\r\n*IMPORTANT NOTE: STAFFPAD **REQUIRES** A DEVICE WITH ACTIVE PEN CAPABILITIES. DESIGNED FOR SURFACE.\r\n\r\nMUSIC RECOGNITION\r\nStaffPad has been designed from the ground up for pen input. Simply write your music straight on to the screen, using your device’s pen. As you move from bar to bar, StaffPad will convert your handwriting into a beautifully engraved score. You can draw notes, beams, stems, articulations, accidentals, slurs, ties and more. It’s the most natural way to write music on digital device, ever.\r\n\r\nAN ORCHESTRA IN THE TIP OF YOUR PEN\r\nStaffPad contains a bespoke playback engine, and an entire orchestra which has been meticulously recorded and programmed to play back your score with incredible realism. Multiple dynamics layers, multiple recorded articulations, repetition samples and smart playback rules ensure that what you see is what you hear. The entire symphony orchestra is represented, and more instruments are available to purchase from the in-app store.\r\n\r\nStaffPad is powerful. Everything from a basic piano lead sheet to a full symphony score can be written with StaffPad.\r\n\r\nA BEAUTIFUL EXPERIENCE\r\nWriting music should be the focus of a composer. StaffPad handles everything else for you whilst you work. The interface has been designed to reduce clutter, and is context sensitive - showing only the information you want, when you want it.\r\n\r\nPEN AND TOUCH\r\nBy combining the power of digital inking and multitouch, we can offer a no-compromises approach to virtual manuscript. Use your finger to move around the score, and pinch to zoom - with butter-smooth scrolling. When you want to write music, just use the pen. Use your eraser button on the pen to remove both ink strokes and existing notation. You can also draw freehand on the score, using the sketch layer, to quickly brainstorm and leave notes/comments for yourself and others.\r\n\r\nPRINT YOUR RESULTS\r\nStaffPad will intelligently layout the score when it’s time to print. You can print the entire score, as well as individual parts for each musician. StaffPad has smart collision avoidance and music layout rules which handle the reflowing of the music to a page-based layout automatically.\r\n\r\nSHARE YOUR WORK\r\nStaffPad allows you to easily share and export your work. You can export MIDI and MusicXML, should you wish to continue working on your score in other programs. You can also export your score to MP3/WAV format, or quickly email an MP3 of your work in just a couple of taps. StaffPad also supports import of MusicXML and MIDI files.\r\n\r\nSCORE SYNC AND AUTO-SAVE\r\nStaffPad is always saving your score, and keeping track of versions - which you can return to at anytime. By saving your scores to OneDrive, you can ensure that your scores are kept in sync across all your devices. StaffPad also syncs your settings and preferences. You can also organise your scores into ‘collections’, meaning that your scores and projects stay neatly organised, for easy access. You can even pin frequently accessed scores straight to the Start Screen.\r\n\r\nCOMPOSER ASSISTANT\r\nA voice activated composer assistant allows you to interact with your score using your voice. Want to change the key signature to G major at bar 10? No problem - tap the assistant and say \"Change to G major at bar 10\". The assistant can quickly help you set up your score, adding instruments, setting the tempo, the key signature, the time signature, adding barlines, playing from rehearsal marks or specific bars, printing, exporting and transposing your score. Currently, the voice assistant is available in US and UK English only.\r\n\r\nEXPRESS YOURSELF\r\nStaffPad is the first notation application which allows you to easily draw dynamics/music expression data right onto the staff. By toggling the expression layer, you can elegantly draw in additional dynamics detail, which can enhance the realism of playback without compromising the existing dynamics markings on your score.\r\n\r\nPROFESSIONAL FEATURES\r\nStaffPad intelligently handles transposing instruments, allowing you to write in concert pitch and toggle to transposing when you’re ready, or when printing. You can write music in multiple voices, transpose selections, reverse stem directions, quickly repeat bars and insert text intuitively via the  quick input tiles. Quick symbols provide the easiest way to enter trills, tremolos, fermatas, rehearsal marks, pedal markings, hairpins and much more.\r\n\r\nEDUCATION\r\nStaffPad is designed for professional composers and musicians, but it’s also a great learning tool for students. Within the application there are multiple video tutorials explaining how to use the app, and key musical concepts. \r\n\r\nCOMPATIBILITY:\r\nStaffPad REQUIRES a device with a digital pen (also known as an active digitiser) and multitouch capabilities in order to function as designed*. If your device does not support pen and touch, the app will not function correctly. Support will not be available to users attempting to run StaffPad on an incompatible device.\r\n\r\n*StaffPad has been designed for Surface 3, Surface Pro 3 and Surface Pro 4.","ProductFamilyName":"Apps","Schema":"Card;1"},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V8.One.CardModel, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ProductId":"9WZDNCRDR0SF","TileLayout":"Square","Title":"One Calendar","Images":[{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"logo","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.49190.9007199266538018.100f6778-8fbb-455b-91f6-db7fabe98246.ae32a4d7-4e18-40ce-8fbf-1c4f9ee5d027","Height":300,"Width":300,"BackgroundColor":"","ForegroundColor":"","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"logo","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.55864.9007199266538018.100f6778-8fbb-455b-91f6-db7fabe98246.d5b8e0e7-53ac-4a60-9f64-a826a29defb8","Height":150,"Width":150,"BackgroundColor":"","ForegroundColor":"","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""}],"DisplayPrice":"Gratis⁺","Price":0.0,"AverageRating":4.1,"RatingsCount":"240","PackageFamilyNames":["64885BlueEdge.OneCalendar_8kea50m9krsh2"],"ContentIds":["d5a560bc-c6a6-48ab-d00e-5d27aee880b9","ca82cbc6-975a-f9c0-7632-ba1b42e447f5"],"GamingOptionsXboxLive":false,"AvailableDevicesDisplayText":"  ","AvailableDevicesNarratorText":"Pc,HoloLens,Mobiel","TypeTag":"app","RecommendationReason":"","LongDescription":"De meest populaire app voor al je kalenders zoals Google, Live, Outlook, iCloud, Exchange, Office365 en Facebook. \r\nOneCalendar integreert al je online kalenders in een makkelijk leesbaar overzicht. Kruip in de huid van Lara Croft op haar eerste grafroofexpeditie, waarin ze op zoek gaat naar het geheim van de onsterfelijkheid. Suite can open a wide variety of file formats.\r\n\r\n- Opening text documents\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.odt, .ott, .oth, .odm, .sxw, .stw, and .sxg ), Word Editor can open the following text document formats:\r\n• Microsoft Word 2007 - 2019 (.docx)\r\n• Microsoft Word 6.0/95/97/2000/XP (.doc and .dot)\r\n• Microsoft Word 2003 XML (.xml)\r\n• Microsoft Word 2007 XML (.docx, .docm, .dotx, .dotm)\r\n• Microsoft WinWord 5 (.doc)\r\n• WordPerfect Document (.wpd)\r\n• WPS 2000/Office 1.0 (.wps)\r\n• .rtf, .txt, and .csv\r\n• StarWriter formats (.sdw, .sgl, .vor)\r\n• DocBook (.xml)\r\n• Unified Office Format text (.uot, .uof)\r\n• Ichitaro 8/9/10/11 (.jtd and .jtt)\r\n• Hangul WP 97 (.hwp)\r\n• T602 Document (.602, .txt)\r\n• AportisDoc (Palm) (.pdb)\r\n• Pocket Word (.psw)\r\nWhen opening .htm or .html files (used for web pages), Ultra Office Suite customizes Writer for working with these files.\r\n\r\n- Opening spreadsheets\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.ods, .ots, .sxc and .stc), Excel Editor can open the following spreadsheet formats:\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2007 - 2019 (.xlsx)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP (.xls, .xlw, and .xlt)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 4.x–5.0/95 (.xls, .xlw, and .xlt)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2003 XML (.xml)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2007 XML (.xlsx, .xlsm, .xltx, .xltm)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2007 binary (.xlsb)\r\n• Lotus 1-2-3 (.wk1, .wks, and .123)\r\n• Data Interchange Format (.dif)\r\n• Rich Text Format (.rtf)\r\n• Text CSV (.csv and .txt)\r\n• StarCalc formats (.sdc and .vor)\r\n• dBASE (.dbf)\r\n• SYLK (.slk)\r\n• Unified Office Format spreadsheet (.uos, .uof)\r\n• .htm and .html files, including Web page queries\r\n• Pocket Excel (pxl)\r\n• Quattro Pro 6.0 (.wb2)\r\n\r\n- Opening presentations\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.odp, .odg, .otp,.sxi, and .sti), PowerPoint Editor can open the following presentation formats:\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 - 2019 (.pptx)\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 97/2000/XP (.ppt, .pps, and .pot)\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 (.pptx, .pptm, .potx, .potm)\r\n• StarDraw and StarImpress (.sda, .sdd, .sdp, and .vor)\r\n• Unified Office Format presentation (.uop, .uof)\r\n• CGM – Computer Graphics Metafile (.cgm)\r\n\r\n- Opening graphic files\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.odg, .otg, .sxd,.std,.sxd, .std), Draw can open the following graphic formats:\r\nBMP\tJPEG, JPG\tPCX\tPSD\tSGV\tWMF\r\nDXF\tMET\tPGM\tRAS\tSVM\tXBM\r\nEMF\tPBM\tPLT\tSDA\tTGA\tXPM\r\nEPS\tPCD\tPNG\tSDD\tTIF, TIFF\t\r\nGIF\tPCT\tPPM\tSGF\tVOR\t\r\n\r\n- Opening formula files\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument Formula (.odf) files, Math can open the format (.sxm), StarMath, (.smf), and MathML (.mml) files.\r\nWhen opening a Word document that contains an embedded equation editor object, if the option for it is checked in Tools > Options > Load/Save > Microsoft Office, the object will be automatically converted to an Ultra Office Suite Math object.\r\n\r\n***File formats Ultra Office Suite can save to\r\n\r\n-Saving text documents\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.odt and .ott), Word Editor can save in these formats:\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Text Document (.sxw)\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Text Document Template (.stw)\r\n• Microsoft Word 2007 - 2019 (.docx)\r\n• Microsoft Word 6.0, 95, and 97/2000/XP (.doc)\r\n• Microsoft Word 2003 XML (.xml)\r\n• Rich Text Format (.rtf)\r\n• StarWriter 3.0, 4.0, and 5.0 (.sdw)\r\n• StarWriter 3.0, 4.0, and 5.0 Template (.vor)\r\n• Text (.txt)Text Encoded (.txt)\r\n• Unified Office Format text (.uot, .uof)\r\n• HTML Document (OpenOffice.org Writer) (.html and .htm)\r\n• DocBook (.xml)\r\n• AportisDoc (Palm) (.pdb)\r\n• Pocket Word (.psw)\r\n\t\r\n-Saving spreadsheet files\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.ods and .ots), Excel Editor can save in these formats:\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Spreadsheet (.sxc)\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Spreadsheet Template (.stc)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2007 - 2019 (.xlsx)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP (.xls and .xlw)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 97/2000/XP Template (.xlt)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 5.0 and 95 (.xls and .xlw)\r\n• Microsoft Excel 2003 XML (.xml)\r\n• Data Interchange Format (.dif)\r\n• dBase (.dbf)SYLK (.slk)Text CSV (.csv and .txt)\r\n• StarCalc 3.0, 4.0, and 5.0 formats (.sdc and .vor)\r\n• Unified Office Format spreadsheet (.uos)\r\n• HTML Document (OpenOffice.org Calc) (.html and .htm)\r\n• Pocket Excel (.pxl)\r\n\t\r\n-Saving presentations\r\nIn addition to OpenDocument formats (.odp, .otp, and .odg), PowerPoint Editor can save in these formats:\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Presentation (.sxi)\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.x Presentation Template (.sti)\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 - 2019 (.pptx)\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 97/2000/XP (.ppt)\r\n• Microsoft PowerPoint 97/2000/XP Template (.pot)\r\n• StarDraw, StarImpress (.sda, .sdd, and .vor)\r\n• Unified Office Format presentation (.uop)\r\nImpress can also export to MacroMedia Flash (.swf) and any of the graphics formats listed for Draw.\r\n\r\n-Saving drawings\r\nDraw can only save in the OpenDocument Drawing formats (.odg and .otg), the OpenOffice.org 1.x formats (.sxd and .std) and StarDraw format (.sda, .sdd, and .vor).\r\nHowever, Draw can also export to BMP, EMF, EPS, GIF, JPEG, MET, PBM, PCT, PGM, PNG, PPM, RAS, SVG, SVM, TIFF, WMF, and XPM.\r\n\r\n-Word Editor/Web can save in these formats\r\n• HTML document (.html and .htm), as HTML 4.0 Transitional\r\n• OpenOffice.org 1.0 HTML Template (.stw)\r\n• OpenOffice.org 2.x HTML Template is a brand-new title from the creators of This War of Mine. It’s a society survival game that asks what people are capable of when pushed to the brink of extinction. In an entirely frozen world, people develop steam-powered technology to oppose the overwhelming cold. The city’s ruler has to manage both the citizens and the infrastructure they live in. The leader’s tactical skills face challenges that will frequently question morality and the basic foundations of what we consider organized society. Optimization and resource management often clash with empathy and thoughtful decision-making. While city and society management will consume most of the ruler’s time, at some point exploration of the outside world is necessary to understand its history and present state.\r\n\r\nWhat decisions will you make to ensure the survival of your society? What will you do when pushed to the limit? And...\r\n\r\n...who will you become in the process?\r\n\r\nMAKE THE LAW\r\nSociety is a group of people who abide by the same rules and share similar beliefs. Establish laws that regulate the existence of your growing society. Decide on their working routine, healthcare, food provision and other crucial aspects of everyday life. Maintain their hope and contentment – the moral condition of your society is as important as securing the basic means to keep them fed and safe.\r\n\r\nWEIGH UP YOUR CHOICES\r\nSome of your decisions will seem small – like deciding the fate of a troubled citizen or meeting the demands of a newborn faction – but be aware that the sum of your doings can lead to unexpected results. Your people put their faith in you, but their devotion is not limitless. Leadership can be a burden.\r\n\r\nDEVELOP NEW TECHNOLOGIES\r\nSurvival demands progress. React to current events, but don’t forget about the long term and investing in development and technological progress. Providing a highly advanced infrastructure with self-powered automatons, airships and other technical wonders is difficult, but achievable. It all depends on your management and leadership skills.\r\n\r\nEXPLORE THE FROSTLAND\r\nWhile New London is your main focus, there is much more to the world than what lies within the limits of your city. Expeditions, while risky, can bring you valuable intel, precious supplies and grow your society’s population. There may be people out there, and their fate lies solely in your hands.\r\n\r\nSHAPE YOUR SOCIETY\r\nIf you reach a turning point, do not hesitate to determine the path of your people. Should you rule them with an iron fist... or show them a way of compassion and faith? Reach for extremes or try to find a fair balance. Whichever you choose, remember: there’s no turning back.\r\n\r\nGO BEYOND THE CAMPAIGN\r\nThe main story campaign can go different ways depending on your playstyle, but it is still not the only challenge to tackle. Frostpunk offers different scenarios and additional updates with new content will be added in the If you want to save some previous lines, you can scroll back (SHIFT+UP) first and then select the menu; the text line buffer is cleared up to the currently visible top line.\r\n- ALT+SHIFT+P now takes a snapshot of a terminal window with its title bar and frame border. If you just want the content area, press ALT+P.\r\n- Layout Freezer is added for saving and restoring the layout of opened terminal windows\r\n- New cipher \"chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com\" is added\r\n- TCP Direct connection method now supports TLS 1.2 encryption and can be used for directly connecting to HTTPS servers\r\n- More host key types are added: ecdsa-sha2-nistp256, ecdsa-sha2-nistp384, ecdsa-sha2-nistp521, ssh-ed25519\r\n- More key exchange algorithms are added: curve25519-sha256@libssh.org, ecdh-sha2-nistp256, ecdh-sha2-nistp384, ecdh-sha2-nistp521, diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256\r\n- Now supports Bluetooth/RFCOMM communication. This feature can be handy when you're developing or debugging a custom Bluetooth service for IoT devices. For an example of such usage with Windows IoT on Raspberry Pi 2, please visit http://token2shell.com/howto/bluetooth-iot-sample\r\n- Proprietary printing mode (ESC[2016i) for directly previewing and printing a PDF file now supported (http://token2shell.com/howto/local-print)\r\n- Keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+C and CTRL+SHIFT+V are added for copy and paste respectively\r\n- CTRL+SHIFT+A keyboard shortcut is added for selecting all buffered terminal lines; Token2Shell first enables its 'Find' text mode and then selects all
